snippet: Patrick Morgan of Buffalo had obtained Ecstasy pills for a friend, who in turn distributed some to a man who died at a Manhattan music festival in 2013.
abstract: Patrick Morgan pleads guilty in federal court to one count of conspiring to distribute narcotics; Morgan had gotten Ecstasy pills for a friend, who distributed them at the Electric Zoo music festival in 2013, leading to death of Jeffrey Russ.
lead_paragraph: Patrick Morgan of Buffalo had obtained Ecstasy pills for a friend, who in turn distributed some to a man who died at a Manhattan music festival in 2013.

headline.main: Guilty Plea in Drug Death at Electric Zoo Festival
headline.print_headline: Guilty Plea in Drug Death at Festival
